code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[message,setMessage]=useState('');const[response,setResponse]=useState('');const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setLoading(true);try{const result=await axios.post('http://localhost:3001/api/chat',{message});setResponse(result.data.reply);}catch(error){console.error('Error:',error);setResponse('Error: Failed to get response');}setLoading(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"title",children:"Gemini AI Chat"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"chat-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{value:message,onChange:e=>setMessage(e.target.value),className:"chat-input",placeholder:"Enter your message..."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",disabled:loading,className:"send-button",children:loading?'Sending...':'Send Message'})]}),response&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"response-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"response-title",children:"Response:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"response-text",children:response})]})]});}export default App;
